title: This Could Get Unconstitutional
description:
Guest host Virginia Heffernan talks to Asli B창li, a professor of law and international human rights at UCLA, about what we learned from the past effects of NSEERS (National Security Entry-Exit Registration System) on Muslim communities and taking a deeper look at Trump and his administration's views on a Muslim registry.
